thread.title: Ground News - Israel Airstrikes Target Damascus Airport, One Day After Reopening
thread.title_full: Ground News - Israel Airstrikes Target Damascus Airport, One Day After Reopening

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Israel Airstrikes Target Damascus Airport, One Day After Reopening
text:
Summary by Ground News Initial reports indicated several explosions in Damascus, Syria. Syrian state owned media reported that Israeli airstrikes had targeted a Syrian army radar site Tal al-Sahn in Al-suwayda. The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights announced that Israeli airstrike had targeted both Syrian military air defense systems at that site and Damascus airport. Share menu More

Atlas News Israel Airstrikes Target Damascus Airport, One Day After Reopening Update (1744 EST): Israeli airstrikes are ongoing, more explosions were registered at Damascus International Airport 1723 EST. At approximately 1513 EST, initial reports indicated several explosions in Damascus, Syria.
